alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 3:17PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Gulf, southwestern Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida and southwestern Liberty Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 400 PM EDT/300 PM CDT/... At 316 PM EDT/216 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Stonemill Creek, or 16 miles south of Blountstown, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stonemill Creek, Orange, Wewahitchka, Abe Springs, Sharpstown, Vilas, Chipola Cutoff, Jensen Place, Central City, Red Hill, Clio, Marysville, Scotts Ferry, Estiffanulga, Kern, Wilma, Frink, Kinard, Lewis and Woods. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Liberty
